data.title: The weather in April in Bahçecik
data.meta_description: The average weather for the month of April in Bahçecik. Read about the average temperatures and rainfall in Bahçecik for April.
data.text:
Normal weather for Bahçecik in April

It's cool to moderate in April in Bahçecik with an average temperature of 18°C. Temperatures this month range from a low of 14°C to a high of 23°C. At night, you can expect temperatures between 2°C and 10°C.

In April, there is an average of 20 mm of precipitation, spread over 15 days days. Of the total precipitation, about 0,3 cm falls as snow in April. The wind speed is around 4 Bft, mostly coming from the Southwest.

The UV index is a maximum of 8 this month. That's a very high value on the intensity scale of 1 to 11. Unprotected skin can burn within 10-15 minutes.

Looking for great weather? April is a good time to be in Bahçecik. The temps are nice, and there’s little chance of rain this month.

Check out the climate of Bahçecik for all months and discover the best travel time

Daily Temperature in April in Bahçecik

This chart shows the average daily high temperatures in April in Bahçecik, measured in degrees Celsius. The bottom of the chart shows the days of April. Based on historical data, it shows the average daily temperatures for this month.

Daily Rainfall in April in Bahçecik

This chart shows the average daily rainfall in April for Bahçecik, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail. The bottom of the chart shows the days of April. Based on historical data, this chart gives an idea of how much rain you can expect each day.

Daily Snowfall in April in Bahçecik

This chart shows the average daily snowfall in April in Bahçecik, measured in centimetres. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. The data is based on historical measurements and gives an idea of the average snowfall in April.

Daily UV Index in April in Bahçecik

This chart shows the average daily UV index in April in Bahçecik, with the UV index ranging from 0 to a maximum of 11. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. Based on historical data, this chart provides an idea of the daily UV radiation levels you can expect.

Temperature in April in Bahçecik Over the Years

This chart shows the average temperature in April in Bahçecik, measured in degrees Celsius, over the past years.

Total Rainfall in April in Bahçecik Over the Years

This chart shows the average rainfall in April in Bahçecik, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail.
